scripts.start: npm run watch:all & npm run live-server
scripts.watch:ts: rm -rf js && tsc -w && watchify js/index.js -o js/bundle.js
scripts.watch:all: npm run watch:ts && npm run watch:scss
scripts.build: npm run build:css && npm run build:js
scripts.make:containers: mkdir dist && mkdir dist/js && mkdir dist/css && mkdir dist/static
scripts.dist-prep: npm run make:containers && mv index.html dist/ && mv css/bundle.css dist/css/ && mv js/bundle.js dist/js && mv static/favicon.ico dist/static && mv songs dist
